title: MB1 wont bind
body:
So I used to have Mouse Button 1 (left click) attached to attack move, until i recently accidentally reset my hotkeys, ever since, I can't left click anything in game unless i hold shift, and i can't bind MB1 to anything, i've tried going into the input.ini file but if i change the attack move the MB1 it just wont change in game. Pleaseeeeeee help, as you can imagine its extremely frustrating.

I also wrote this in help and support but i don't think too many people would see it there. :( halp guys.
